site_name:
Greggs And No. 2 Gould Road
Gould Road
Twickenham
TW2 6RT
description:
Demolition of existing buildings (with retention of a single dwelling) and redevelopment of the site to provide up to 116 residential units and 175 sqm commercial floorspace (Use Class E(g)) with associated hard and soft landscaping, car parking and highways works and other
associated works.
decision_conditions: Restriction on change of use (Class E(g)
